attributes.title: Mikken
attributes.2: note<small><nowiki>*</nowiki>Uncredited appearances</small>==Behind the scenes==Mikken is played by Boyd Rankin, who is an armorer and weapon smith for the series.==In the books==In the ''A Song of Ice and Fire'' novels, Mikken is the blacksmith at Winterfell. It was not Farlen the kennelmaster but he that talked defiantly to Theon Greyjoy. One of the Stygg

sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, Mikken is the blacksmith at [[Winterfell]]. It was not [[Farlen]] the kennelmaster but he that talked defiantly to [[Theon Greyjoy]]. One of the [[Stygg|ironborn]] beat and killed Mikken for his defiance.
sections.Behind the scenes: Mikken is played by [[Boyd Rankin]], who is an armorer and weapon smith for the series.
sections.Biography:
===[[Season 1]]===
Mikken is seen in the background when Bran is practicing archery while his brothers watch (particularly in the close-up shot ofÂ Rickon'sÂ laugh). Later MikkenÂ assembles with the [[Winterfell]] household to receive King [[Robert Baratheon]]. He stands behind Maester [[Luwin]].<ref>"[[Winter is Coming (episode)|Winter is Coming]]"</ref> Mikken forges the sword, [[Needle]], for [[Jon Snow]] to give to his sister, [[Arya Stark]].<ref>"[[The Kingsroad]]"</ref> [[Eddard Stark]] finds Arya with the sword and recognizes Mikken's maker's mark on it.<ref>"[[Lord Snow]]"</ref>
